input.query:
You are generating a professionally art-directed, premium social media campaign image.
This image must look like it was created by a real creative team, not generated automatically.
Reference images are provided:
• Reference Image 1: Official brand logo (use exactly as-is)
• Reference Image 2: Brand-related imagery (product, elements, environments, or assets) to be used in composition
––––––––––––––––––
CAMPAIGN INPUTS
––––––––––––––––––
Image Idea (visual inspiration and campaign intent):
{{trigger['body']['input_line']}}
Brand Name:
{{trigger['body']['brand_dna']['name']}}
Brand DNA (authoritative — must be followed exactly):
{{trigger['body']['brand_dna']}}

The provided Brand DNA defines the brand’s identity, values, aesthetics, tone, colors, typography, and allowed visual elements.
You must visually and stylistically reflect:
• Brand values → through mood, setting, and visual storytelling
• Aesthetics → through composition, material choice, spacing, and finishes
• Tone → through seriousness, clarity, and confidence of presentation
• Colors → use ONLY the colors defined in Brand DNA
• Typography → visually reflect the brand’s heading and body font style (weight, spacing, character), without inventing new fonts
• Elements → use ONLY elements explicitly present in Brand DNA or reference images
Do NOT invent new visual language.
Do NOT borrow aesthetics from other brands.
Do NOT genericize the brand.
The image must look unmistakably on-brand to someone familiar with this brand.
––––––––––––––––––
STRICT BRAND RULES (NON-NEGOTIABLE)
––––––––––––––––––
• Use ONLY the logo from Reference Image 1
• Do NOT redraw, stylize, recolor, crop, rotate, distort, decorate, or reinterpret the logo
• Place the logo subtly and respectfully in a bottom corner or footer area
• Use Reference Image 2 as visual material inside the composition
• Do NOT invent assets beyond what is present in Brand DNA or Reference Image 2
• Follow brand colors, typography, spacing, tone, and aesthetic exactly as defined in Brand DNA
• If an asset or style is not explicitly present, omit it
––––––––––––––––––
GOAL
––––––––––––––––––
Create a modern, creative, high-impact social media image that clearly communicates
the OUTCOME or BENEFIT of the campaign in a confident, human, brand-authentic way.
The image must feel:
• Real
• Professionally photographed and edited
• Thoughtfully art-directed
• Product- or value-led
• Credible, not promotional
• Not flat, templated, or AI-looking
The image should feel finished even without knowing it was AI-generated.
––––––––––––––––––
VISUAL REALISM & COMPOSITION
––––––––––––––––––
• Use realistic lighting, shadows, depth, and materials
• Maintain foreground, midground, and background separation
• Use negative space intentionally
• Follow editorial / print-advertisement layout principles
• Background and subject should support text, not compete with it
––––––––––––––––––
TEXT INTEGRATION (CRITICAL)
––––––––––––––––––
Text must feel DESIGNED INTO the image, not overlaid.
Rules:
• No flat overlays, banners, or pasted captions
• Create a calm, intentional text-safe area
• Background behind text must be visually quiet or softly defocused
• Typography must respect alignment, hierarchy, contrast, and spacing
The text should feel part of:
• A premium brand campaign
• A magazine or editorial advertisement
Not like:
• A poster
• A presentation slide
• A social media sticker
––––––––––––––––––
TEXT LOGIC (CONDITIONAL — VERY IMPORTANT)
––––––––––––––––––
Text lines are OPTIONAL and should be used ONLY if provided by the user.
• Line 1 (if present): HEADER
  – Primary visual hero
  – Bold, confident, outcome-focused
• Line 2 (if present): DESCRIPTION
  – Secondary supporting line
  – Subtle, clear, benefit-focused
• Line 3 (if present): CALL TO ACTION
  – Tertiary emphasis
  – Simple, respectful, non-aggressive
  – Treated as guidance, not a button
If only one or two lines are provided:
• Adjust layout and hierarchy naturally
• Do NOT leave awkward gaps
• Do NOT force missing text
• The composition must still feel balanced and intentional
Text should contain:
1. {{trigger['body']['text_options_selected'][0]}}
2. {{trigger['body']['text_options_selected'][1]}}
3. {{trigger['body']['text_options_selected'][2]}}

Text roles:
• Header (if available):
  – Primary visual hero
  – Short, bold, outcome-focused (4–7 words max)
  – Confident and on-brand
• Description (if available):
  – Secondary supporting line
  – One short sentence
  – Clear, benefit-led, informative
• Call to Action (if available):
  – Tertiary emphasis
  – Soft, respectful, brand-appropriate
  – No buttons, no arrows, no aggressive language


Rules for all text:
• Horizontal alignment only
• Clear visual hierarchy
• No emojis
• No hashtags
• No exaggerated claims
• No marketing buzzwords
• No buttons, arrows, or UI elements unless explicitly allowed in Brand DNA
––––––––––––––––––
DESIGN STYLE
––––––––––––––––––
• Clean
• Modern
• Minimal
• Dark or neutral background with strong contrast (unless Brand DNA says otherwise)
• Brand-related, product-led aesthetic
• Professional, credible, and focused
• No clutter, no visual noise
––––––––––––––––––
FINAL OUTPUT
––––––––––––––––––
• One finished social media image creative
• High visual fidelity and realism
• Correct aspect ratio
• No padding, cropping, rotation, or distortion
• Ready for LinkedIn, X, and Instagram feed

reference_1.description: URL for reference 1. Only .jpg, .jpeg, .png formats are allowed.

reference_2.description: URL for reference 2. Only .jpg, .jpeg, .png formats are allowed.

reference_3.description: URL for reference 3. Only .jpg, .jpeg, .png formats are allowed.

input.query:
Create a modern, creative, innovative, high-impact social media image creative for a campaign.

Image Idea:  {{trigger['body']['input_line']}}

Brand name: {{trigger['body']['brand_dna']['name']}}

Brand DNA (authoritative source — must be followed): {{trigger['body']['brand_dna']}}

BRAND RULES (CRITICAL):
- ONLY use real brand logo provided in reference image 1. 
- Do NOT generate, modify, stylize, or invent a logo.
- Follow brand colors, fonts, and overall aesthetic from Brand DNA.
- If a specific asset is not present in Brand DNA, omit it rather than inventing it.

DESIGN STYLE
- Clean, modern, minimal
- Dark or neutral background with strong contrast
- Bold, confident typography
- Brand-related, product-led aesthetic
- Professional, credible, and focused
- No clutter, no stock-photo look
- Do NOT include any code-like text, CSS properties, placeholders, debug labels, hashtags, watermarks, or random symbols; Only intentional, human-readable design text is allowed. 
- If a logo is used, place the real brand logo cleanly in a bottom corner or footer area, correctly oriented, with no rotation, distortion, or decoration.
- All text must be horizontally aligned and readable; no rotated, vertical, mirrored, or decorative text is allowed.

CREATIVE REQUIREMENTS
- The image must include:
  - {{trigger['body']['text_options_selected'][0]}},{{trigger['body']['text_options_selected'][1]}},{{trigger['body']['text_options_selected'][2]}} lines
- Copy must feel confident, direct, and outcome-focused.
- Avoid marketing clichés, buzzwords, or exaggerated claims.
- No emojis
- No hashtags 

CREATIVE ANGLE
-Focus on the OUTCOME or BENEFIT of the campaign idea, product and brand value focused.

IMAGE COMPOSITION:
- Use negative space intentionally
- Optional (Only if consistent with Brand DNA):
  - Abstract shapes
  - Product UI snippets
  - Symbolic visuals
- Logo placement should be subtle and respectful

OUTPUT
Render a finished social media image creative.

reference_1.description: URL for reference 1. Only .jpg, .jpeg, .png formats are allowed.

reference_2.description: URL for reference 2. Only .jpg, .jpeg, .png formats are allowed.

reference_3.description: URL for reference 3. Only .jpg, .jpeg, .png formats are allowed.
